metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: jQuery Online Editor
jQuery Editor
With our online jQuery editor, you can edit jQuery code, and view the result in your browser.
content.html: With our online jQuery editor, you can edit jQuery code, and view the result in your browser.

content.text: Example

content.code_html:
$(document).ready(function(){
  $("p").click(function(){
    $(this).hide();
  });
});

content.text: If you click on me, I will disappear.
content.html: If you click on me, I will disappear.

content.text: Click me away!
content.html: Click me away!

content.text: Click me too!
content.html: Click me too!

content.text: Click on the "Try it Yourself" button to see how it works.
content.html: Click on the "Try it Yourself" button to see how it works.

content.text: Publish Your Code
If you want to save your jQuery code, and create your own website or web application, check out W3Schools Spaces .
content.html: If you want to save your jQuery code, and create your own website or web application, check out W3Schools Spaces.

content.text: W3Schools Spaces is a website-building tool that lets you make and share your own website.
content.html: W3Schools Spaces is a website-building tool that lets you make and share your own website.

content.text: You can change the website's look and how it works by editing the code right in your web browser.
content.html: You can change the website's look and how it works by editing the code right in your web browser.

content.text: It's easy to use and doesn't require any setup:
content.html: It's easy to use and doesn't require any setup:

content.text: The code editor is packed with features to help you achieve more:
content.html: The code editor is packed with features to help you achieve more:

content.text: Learn Faster
Practice is key to mastering coding, and the best way to put your jQuery knowledge into practice is by getting practical with code.
content.html: Practice is key to mastering coding, and the best way to put your jQuery knowledge into practice is by getting practical with code.

content.text: Use W3Schools Spaces to build, test and deploy code.
content.html: Use W3Schools Spaces to build, test and deploy code.

content.text: The code editor lets you write and practice different types of computer languages. It includes HTML/CSS/JavaScript, and you can use it for other languages too.
content.html: The code editor lets you write and practice different types of computer languages. It includes HTML/CSS/JavaScript, and you can use it for other languages too.

content.text: New languages are added all the time:
content.html: New languages are added all the time:

content.text: If you do not know jQuery, we suggest that you read our jQuery Tutorial from scratch.
content.html: If you do not know jQuery, we suggest that you read our jQuery Tutorial from scratch.

content.text: Build Powerful Websites
You can also use the code editor in W3School Spaces to build frontend or full-stack websites from scratch.
content.html: You can also use the code editor in W3School Spaces to build frontend or full-stack websites from scratch.

content.text: Or you can use the 60+ templates available and save time:
content.html: Or you can use the 60+ templates available and save time:

content.text: Create your Spaces account today and explore them all!
content.html: Create your Spaces account today and explore them all!

content.text: Share It With The World
Host and publish your websites in no time with W3School Spaces .
content.html: Host and publish your websites in no time with W3School Spaces.

content.text: W3Schools subdomain and SSL certificate are included for free with W3School Spaces . An SSL certificate makes your website safe and secure. It also helps people trust your website and makes it easier to find it online.
content.html: W3Schools subdomain and SSL certificate are included for free with W3School Spaces. An SSL certificate makes your website safe and secure. It also helps people trust your website and makes it easier to find it online.

content.text: Want a custom domain for your website?
content.html: Want a custom domain for your website?

content.text: You can buy a domain or transfer an existing one and connect it to your space.
content.html: You can buy a domain or transfer an existing one and connect it to your space.

content.text: How Does It Work?
Get started in a few clicks with W3School Spaces .
content.html: Get started in a few clicks with W3School Spaces.
